entry.title: Hello,world!
entry.content:
Hi! I am a beginner in computer graphics and am trying to learn aboutit. The opportunity to get into this field was my favorite movieInterstellar, and I'm very interested in the computer graphicstechniques involved, so I'll be doing more in-depth studies I will sharemy notes with some insights on this site.

Also I'm interested in tarot card divination and rock music, and Ishare some of my interesting life here.

Welcome like-minded people to contact me for more communication!
